panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text: I can't tell the difference between shapes and colours
panels.hovertext: I can't tell the difference between right and wrong, yet

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
panels.text: yet I recognise every cow I've ever met in my life
panels.hovertext: I can't tell the difference between right and wrong, yet
